description: The man's left arm is extended outward at shoulder height.
The man's right arm is raised with the elbow bent and aiming forward, as if holding a gun.
The man's left leg is planted firmly on the ground, providing stability.
The man's right leg is bent at the knee, positioned slightly behind the body.
The man's spine is rotated to align with the direction of the turn.
The man's left arm extends forward with a straight punch, the fist tightly clenched.
The man's right arm follows with a swift upward block, the elbow bent at 90 degrees and the palm facing outward.
The man's left leg is bent at the knee, with the foot positioned firmly on the ground for support.
The man's right leg is momentarily lifted off the ground, poised to deliver a kick.
The man's spine maintains an upright posture, slightly flexing forward to engage the core during movements.
The man's left arm is held at a 90-degree angle, bracing the body during the spin.
The man's right arm extends outward, aiding in the momentum of the spin.
The man's left leg is bent at the knee as he shifts weight onto it.
The man's right leg is raised high and extended outward during the kick.
The man's spine rotates smoothly, facilitating the execution of the spinning kick.
The man's left arm remains at his side.
The man's right arm is raised at shoulder height, with the index finger extended forward.
The man's left leg steps slightly back, stabilizing his stance.
The man's right leg pivots on the back foot, completing the turn.
The man's spine rotates sharply to the right.
The man's left arm is extended forward in a guard position with the elbow slightly bent.
The man's right arm is positioned close to the body, ready to parry, with the elbow bent at a 90-degree angle.
The man's left leg is lifted and bent at the knee, ready to deliver a kick.
The man's right leg is extended forward, exhibiting a powerful kick from the hip.
The man's spine is slightly arched forward, emphasizing readiness and balance.
The man's left arm is extended outward to the side, slightly bent at the elbow.
The man's right arm is raised above his head, bent at the elbow with the forearm parallel to the ground.
The man's left leg is pivoting on the toes, supporting his weight as he prepares for the kick.
The man's right leg is lifted and bent at the knee, positioned to execute the kick.
The man's spine is rotating smoothly, aligning with the movement of his hips.
